Reviews.Title: overall nice product
Reviews.Author: Tim Gonzales
Reviews.Content: great product. i just hate that the adjustments are at the camera end. We usually have to mount the camera first, then adjust to the view. makes it VERY TEDIOUS TO ADJUST.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: A. A. Naar
Reviews.Content: first thing, i got the cables and power supply first and 2 day's after i got the cameras.i install then and boy these cam work's greate in the night, the zoom, focus is a bit tricky but for the rest i'm happywith them. i bought these camera to replace 2 old no ccd cams.
